title: Booking a Hotel
description: A phone call to book a hotel room
transcript:
Receptionist: Grand Hotel, how can I help you?
Guest: Hello, I'd like to book a room, please.
Receptionist: Certainly. When would you like to stay?
Guest: From August 10th to August 14th.
Receptionist: That's four nights. Would you prefer a single or double room?
Guest: A double room, please. Is breakfast included?
Receptionist: Yes, breakfast is included. We also have free WiFi and a swimming pool.
Guest: Great. How much is it per night?
Receptionist: It's one hundred and twenty euros per night.
Guest: I'll book it. Can I pay when I arrive?
Receptionist: Yes, you can pay at check-in. We'll need your credit card to guarantee the booking.

questions.question: How many nights is the booking for?
The hotel has a swimming pool.
